mapper.sql: id, wms_id,data_num, cur_time, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, customerid, customer_name,temperature_type_code,temperature_type_name, pack_no, pack_name, qty,pallet_num, fees_no, dbname, is_calculated, remark, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time,write_time,calculate_time, del_flag, extattr1, extattr2, extattr3, extattr4, extattr5,adjust_pallet_num
mapper.select:
select
from biz_pack_storage a where del_flag = 0

select warehouse_name,customer_name,temperature_type_name,COUNT(*) as qty from ( select warehouse_name,customer_name,temperature_type_name from biz_pack_storage a where del_flag = 0 order by create_time desc ) q group by warehouse_name,customer_name,temperature_type_name
mapper.insert: insert into biz_pack_storage(pallet_num,adjust_pallet_num,data_num,wms_id, cur_time, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, customerid, customer_name, temperature_type_code,temperature_type_name, pack_no, pack_name, qty, fees_no, dbname, remark, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time,write_time, is_calculated, calculate_time, del_flag) values ( #{palletNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{adjustPalletNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{dataNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wmsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{curTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temperatureTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temperatureTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{feesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{writeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isCalculated,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{calculateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update biz_pack_storage
data_num=#{dataNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wms_id=#{wmsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cur_time=#{curTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, warehouse_code=#{warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, warehouse_name=#{warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customerid=#{customerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_name=#{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
temperature_type_code=#{temperatureTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, temperature_type_name=#{temperatureTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pack_no=#{packNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pack_name=#{packName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qty=#{qty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pallet_num=#{palletNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, fees_no=#{feesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dbname=#{dbname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_calculated=#{isCalculated,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator=#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time=#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modifier=#{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_modify_time=#{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, write_time=#{writeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, calculate_time=#{calculateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag=#{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark=#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id=#{id}
mapper.select:
select a.data_num from biz_pack_storage a inner join fees_receive_storage b on a.fees_no = b.fees_no inner join fees_bill c on b.bill_no = c.billno and c.delflag = 0 where a.del_flag = 0
LIMIT 1

select a.data_num from biz_pack_storage a where a.del_flag = 0 and a.is_calculated = 1
LIMIT 1
mapper.update: update biz_pack_storage a set a.is_calculated = 99 where a.del_flag = 0
mapper.select:
SELECT a.* from biz_pack_storage a LEFT JOIN fees_receive_storage f on a.fees_no = f.fees_no where f.`status` = '0'
union SELECT a.* from biz_pack_storage a where a.fees_no is null
mapper.delete: delete f.* from biz_pack_storage a LEFT JOIN fees_receive_storage f on a.fees_no = f.fees_no where f.`status` = '0'
mapper.select: SELECT b.customerid,COUNT(*) as num from (SELECT customerid from biz_pack_storage a where del_flag = 0 ) b GROUP BY b.customerid
